TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit LambdaColumnMapper extends System.Object
public ref class LambdaColumnMapper abstract sealed
public ref class LambdaColumnMapper abstract sealed

Docs.summary: This applies the user provided ValueMapper to a column to produce a new column. It automatically injects a standard conversion from the actual type of the source column to typeSrc (if needed).
